buy.Title: Not Enough Money
buy.Body: You do not have enough Money to purchase anything from the shop. Win battles or sell items to receive more funds and try again.

buy.Title: Purchase Complete
buy.Body:
You purchased **{0} {1}(s)** for ${2}.
You now have ${3}.

sell.Title: No Items
sell.Body: You do not have any items available to sell. You can obtain items with **/buy** or by finding them through wild battles.

sell.Title: Sale Complete
sell.Body:
You sold **{0} {1}(s)** for ${2}.
You now have ${3}.

specialshop.Title: No Items
specialshop.Body: You have already purchased all items in your daily shop. Check again tomorrow when the shop recycles.
